text: Is there a way to create a template that has a flex, two-column layout that can flow in any module into either column at the page level? For example, can I create a template that has two blank columns and the user can drag and drop a rich text editor on the left column and an image carousel on the right?
I have flex columns for my templates, but I am not able to make them flow in two modules side-by-side in a two column layout. Each module only stacks...
